turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I am going to visit my parents tonight, I was hoping you could help me order a pizza for our dinner?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely, where do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Dominos on Telegraph would be great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to pick it up, or do you want it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up on my way over to their house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they make a Supreme pizza at Dominos?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a pizza called the Deluxe which I think is similar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What toppings are on the Deluxe?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes with pepperoni, sausage, green peppers, mushrooms and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good, what is the sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is a traditional red sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can it be ordered with less sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that, they call it light sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds delicious thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm, I am getting you a Deluxe pizza with light sauce? What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is perfect, I would like a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order for the large Deluxe with light sauce is in, pizza will be ready in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, do I need to show proof of purchase?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am not sure, but your receipt will be texted to you, so you can show that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any time, enjoy!
